name: Ben Stiller
summary:
Ben Stiller. Producer: Tropic Thunder. Benjamin Edward Meara Stiller was born on November 30, 1965, in New York City, New York, to legendary comedians Jerry Stiller and Anne Meara. His father was of Austrian Jewish and Polish Jewish descent, and his mother was of Irish Catholic descent (she converted to Judaism).

His parents made no real effort to keep their son away from the Hollywood lifestyle and he grew up among...
awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy | 18 wins & 67 nominations total
